Package dr.evomodel.epidemiology.casetocase

Class Summary
AbstractCase Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
AbstractOutbreak Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
CaseToCaseTransmissionLikelihood A likelihood function for transmission between identified epidemiological cases Currently works only for fixed trees and estimates the network and epidemiological parameters.
Morelli12Outbreak Adaptation of the farm incubation and infectious period models from Morelli et al, PLoS Computational Biology, 2012 (10.1371/journal.pcbi.1002768.g001) User: Matthew Hall Date: 07/09/2012
NodePaintingCreepOperator This operator first randomly selects an appropriate node.
NodePaintingSwitchOperator This operator changes the assigned case of a random node from the assigned case of one of its children to the assigned case of the other, and then goes up the tree replacing all ancestral occurances of one to the other.
TransmissionExchangeOperatorA Implements branch exchange operations that leave the transmission network unchanged.
TransmissionExchangeOperatorB Implements branch exchange operations that also exchange entire subtrees of the transmission tree.
TransmissionTreeOperator An operator that wraps a (phylogenetic) tree operator and adjusts the transmission tree accordingly.
TransmissionWilsonBaldingA Implements the Wilson-Balding branch swapping move if it does not change the transmission tree.
TransmissionWilsonBaldingB Implements the Wilson-Balding branch swapping move if the relocated phylogenetic subtree corresponds to a transmission subtree.
 

Exception Summary
